text: 100 men versus a gorilla is a debate and (the subject of various memes on the Internet) asking if 100 unarmed and untrained adult males could defeat a silverback gorilla. The debate first origin was back in 2020, but popularized in late April of 2025. == Reception == In a tweet made by American YouTuber and influencer MrBeast (Jimmy Donaldson), joked that he could make the fight happen. U.S. senator from Montana Tim Sheehy said in a video posted on Twitter (X) that he thinks the men would win but would also receive a lot of casualties. == References == Category:Critical thinking
title: 100 men versus a gorilla
